title: The REDbird Life-cycle [Infographic] The Frequent Miler

type_specific.selection:
REDbird, the new Target Prepaid REDcard, is a terrific new alternative to Bluebird and Serve.  Like Bluebird and Serve, REDbird is a prepaid reloadable card and is a reasonable fee-free checking account alternative.  In addition to no-fees, it offers 5% off all Target purchases and fee free shipping from Target.com.  Best of all, it allows free credit card reloads at Target and free bill pay (see “REDcard changes everything”). REDbird... Continue Reading

The post The REDbird Life-cycle [Infographic] appeared first on The Frequent Miler.
